When I purge the crack then  I should uninstall the Norton completely from my PC, and start again from the beginning in the safe mode?

see with step:-
1-uninstall COMPLETE norton product after it expire.ok
2-run any registry cleaner software and clean ur pc registry.
3-run NTR2013v4.0.exe that i have given and in that 4th option in pink color PURGE .then click on that.
4-restart and install again .thatsit.
for anyone who is wondering you reset the trial before it expires, if you dont you have to uninstall, purge, and reinstall the trial. works fine, 30 day Normal / 60 day Safe Mode.
